import { useRef } from "react" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" const CreateBug = () => { const titleRef = useRef() const statusRef = useRef() const typeRef = useRef() const imageRef = useRef() const onSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() let formData = new FormData() formData.append("title", titleRef.current.value) formData.append("status", statusRef.current.value) formData.append("type", typeRef.current.value) formData.append("image", imageRef.current.value) } return ( <>
